summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to landslide repairs on park property near Lake Washington Boulevard at 46th Avenue South; adding a new project to a CIP program; increasing the 2002 budget of the Department of Parks and Recreation by appropriating funds from the Emergency Subfund; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all upon a two-thirds vote of the City Council.
note: Lake Washington Blvd slide at 46th Ave Project
